Summary: Noticed a chrome object triangular rotating in a cylinder way.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving South and came up to Hwy 66 in Platteville, I had noticed about a mile back something in the sky, it was 3 dots, that were quite large from my view, as I watched it was rotating very quickly while maintaining the shape of a Triangle, I could not beleive what I was seeing, my brother was with me and he verified what I was seeing. I had my camera and took a picture and un-belivably I caught it, and then it just dissappeared! It was like Chrome discs in the sky. I still am in dis-belief but I know what I saw.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Platteville
There were no other sightings in Platteville on or around July 28th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
